artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Random weft floats of various threads and textures, on plain weave ground. Olive, yellow, gold & rust warp. Olive weft. Staples inside mat folder with descriptive Larsen Label. "H-5" printed on outside mat. May be the same as 99.1.1190.4 (olive, yellow, gold, rust)

title: Limelight
